name: Chimeric Rat

trait.name: Keen Smell
text: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Chimeric Creation
text: The rat has gills, iridescent scales, and the ability to breathe air and water.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 piercing damage.

description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden p. 246
